answers.text: You cannot actually import keys. You can only generate keys in AWS KMS.
You must keep a copy of the imported key so that you can re-import it at any time.
Keys generated in AWS KMS must be rotated every 30 days.
Imported keys cost more to store than keys generated in AWS KMS.
You can set an expiration time for the imported key (or delete it on demand).

text: What are the main differences between a key imported into and a key generated in AWS KMS?
